author: Ange Zelenak
description:
I looked into it a bit more and Liberia is doing something similar.

http://online.wsj.com/articles/liberian-ebola-survivor-now-comforts-other-patients-1413301824

If only we could channel this idea and connect with the top experts in the field, provide survivors with the most knowlege, they could be a super-team of individuals to stop the spread. 

Think of it as an army gearing up for a war. If something was attacking we'd round the troups and attack back.
summary: This is clearly a scare and a concern, governments and experts in the field should come together and make a super-team. Why not combine our efforts instead of running franticly? Locate already existing ebola victims (since they can't already get it again) in the area or city and create a team.The government in that area can connect them with medical supplies, proper learning/education of treatment and employment to further attack the spread.If these individuals become knowledgable, they can help treat the masses, and reduce the spread of individual contact.
title: Create a Super-Team of Ebola Fighters
